project_abstract.cdata: The credit will support the government's decision issued in 1985, to reform the management of science and technology programs. The project will: (a) increase the output of scientific researchers trained to international standards through master, doctoral and post-doctoral programs; (b) enhance the quality and productivity of research in strategic areas relevant to long-term economic and social development; (c) strengthen the management of scientific research at both the national and laboratory level; (d) provide a modern scientific infrastructure for Chinese scientists trained at home and abroad; and (e) encourage scientific cooperation across institutional and national boundaries. The projectsists of: (a) support for research and graduate student training in 133 State Key Laboratories (SKL) and Special Laboratories (SL) affiliated with universities and with the Chinese Academy of Sciences (CAS); (b) a pilot program to assist seven of the project laboratories to improve management efficiency and the quality of research and training of graduate students in science; (c) development of a demonstration computer network that will link Qinghua and Beijing Universities and the Computer Center of CAS, and establish an enhanced computing facility at the CAS center; and (d) a program advisory group (PAG) of Chinese and foreign experts that will provide science and technology advice to implementing agencies on the overall direction and progress of all components.

P003478.projectinfo: <![CDATA[<Project><LangCode>ZH</LangCode><ProjectName>重点学科发展项目</ProjectName><ProjectAbstract>本项目将支持实施中国政府1985年颁布的《关于科技体制改革的决定》。项目将：（1）增加通过硕士、博士和博士后课程、按照国际标准培养的科研人员的产出；（2）提高经济社会长期发展相关战略领域的研究质量和效率；（3）加强对国家和实验室层面科研工作的管理；（4）为国内外培养的中国科学家提供现代化科研基础设施；（5）鼓励开展机构间和国际科技合作。项目具体内容包括：（1）支持133个隶属高等院校和中国科学院的国家重点实验室和专业实验室的研究和研究生培养工作；（2）实施一项试点方案，帮助本项目下的7个实验室提高管理效率以及科研质量和科技领域研究生培养质量；（3）建设示范性计算机联网工程，连接清华大学、北京大学和中科院计算机网络信息中心，建设并完善该中心的计算设施；（4）组建方案实施顾问小组。该小组由中外专家组成，将向实施机构就方案各项内容总体方向和实施进度提供科技指导。</ProjectAbstract></Project>]]>
